𒊏𒆠𒁍 ra-ki-bu Recke[Bur]

⇔

𒊏𒅗𒋢 to bind ☑

𒆷𒅗𒁺 to run
⇔

𒊑𒄣 go far off, to be distant
⇔

𒊑𒁺 drive, lead, to accompany

𒊑𒁺 soldier
